plants.name: Koovalam
plants.point1: Roots with anti inflammatory & pain relieving property.
plants.point2: Bael juice daily cures diabetes, cholera , diarrhea, infections, jaundice.
plants.point3: Its juice along with salt & pepper can cure constipation.
plants.point4: leaves are used for lowering blood pressure, Affect in pregnancy, hypertension

plants.name: Kandakari Chunda
plants.point1: Herbal paste relieves from swelling of joint & arthritis.
plants.point2: Roots & seeds as expectorant in Asthma, cough & chest pain.
plants.point3: Root paste with lemon can cure snake & scorpion bites.
plants.point4: Seeds helpful for irregular menstruation Nasal treatment benefit for migraine & headache

plants.name: Cheruchunda
plants.point1: Leaves are the rich source of calcium, iron, phosphorus, carbohydrates, fat, crude fibre and minerals.
plants.point2: Fruit with honey & ghee reduce vomiting.
plants.point3: Decoction  of root & leaves with honey cures cough.
plants.point4: juice with vinegar can be used for mouthwash.

plants.name: Kumbil
plants.point1: Paste is best for headache & Flowers have its use in Leprosy Natural anti aging agent
plants.point2: Consuming decoction with root reduces diarrhoea, piles.
plants.point3: It also helps from snake bite & Root powder in warm water helps in Galactagogue
plants.point4: Extract the leaf juice to wash the ulcers.

plants.name: Orila
plants.point1: Febrifuge, aphrodisiac, analgesic, diuretic,  anti inflammatory, and haemorrhagic properties.
plants.point2: Herb that protects the body from diseases and also helps to boost up the immune system.
plants.point3: This herb also acts as a laxative ,thus helps in easy passing of stools.
plants.point4: Quite effective in the treatment of piles.

plants.name: Moovila
plants.point1: Antidiabetic herbs control sugar level in people with diabetes mellitus.
plants.point2: Antidiarrheal herbs prevent or treat diarrhea & Antipyretic herbs reduce body fever.
plants.point3: Used in treatment of asthma,bronchitis etc...
plants.point4: Rejuvenative helps delay the delaying process.

plants.name: Paathiri
plants.point1: Has therapeutic properties like diuretic,cardiac tonic,anti-inflammatory.
plants.point2: Helps in easy urination and maintains proper urine flow.
plants.point3: Provides relief in burning sensation & helps in maintaining good heart health.
plants.point4: Effective in the treatment of piles & helps to remove toxins from blood and purifies it.

plants.name: Palakapayyani
plants.point1: Leaves are directly applied hot on the skin to treat an enlarged spleen.
plants.point2: The decoction of its root is useful against diarrhea and dysentery.
plants.point3: Roots have beneficial effects in cough,cold and fever.
plants.point4: Fruit is very good for skin,cleansing the wounds & even beneficial for heart problems.

plants.name: Munja
plants.point1: The decoction of root bark can be used in Rheumatoid Arthritis conditions.
plants.point2: The tender leaf juice mix with 'tulsi' is good for pediatric complaints like fever, indigestion,loose bowels.
plants.point3: Can treat indigestion, kapha disorders, nerve pain, and fever.
plants.point4: One of the DASHAMOOLA plant

plants.name: Kurumulak
plants.point1: Antiseptic remedy in tooth decay & gum swellings & antibacterial property helps fight against infections and insect bites.
plants.point2: Antitumor activity for a few types of cancer.
plants.point3: Black pepper with ayurvedic tea is recommended for weight loss.
plants.point4: Soups made with black pepper can treat colds and coughs.

plants.name: Cardamom
plants.point1: Antioxidant & diuretic property lower blood pressure & oral intake of Greater cardamom oil is useful for asthma
plants.point2: Contain cancer fighting compounds & chewing seeds can treat bad breath & cavities.
plants.point3: For vomiting, indigestion, loss of appetite etc, powder of the seeds is given with honey three times a day.
plants.point4: For Urinary obstruction, seed powder with tender coconut water twice to thrice a day.

plants.name: Pera/ Guava
plants.point1: Fruit is good for skin & decoction of leaves  relieves from cough & cold.
plants.point2: Disinfects the respiratory tract, throat & lungs.
plants.point3: Bark is antifungal, anti-bacterial, antiseptic, astringent thus helps with acne.
plants.point4: Fruit has Folic acid, or Vitamin B-9, which is good for pregnant mothers.

plants.name: Irumban puli
plants.point1: Fruit can treat cough, diabetes, blood pressure.
plants.point2: Leaves paste can cure itches, swelling, rheumatism, mumps.
plants.point3: Leaf infusion is used as an after birth tonic.
plants.point4: Flower infusion used for thrush, cough & cold & used in folk medicine to control obesity.

plants.name: Tea plant
plants.point1: Tea helps in weight loss.
plants.point2: Protect bones effective in herbal treatment for rheumatoid arthritis, infection and impaired immune function.
plants.point3: Tea can naturally lower total cholesterol levels reducing risk of heart attack & stroke.
plants.point4: Boosts metabolism & when used for aromatherapy, tea oil can increase energy.

plants.name: Samudrapacha
plants.point1: Serves as tonic for nervous system.
plants.point2: Can stop bleeding from wounds.
plants.point3: Good herbal medicine to enhance brain functionality & effective for anxiety & rheumatism.
plants.point4: Solves urination problem & can cure allergies

plants.name: Vathamkolli
plants.point1: Used for headache, cough, bronchitis, fever, fractured bones.
plants.point2: Used in birth control pill for men.
plants.point3: Can cure Rheumatoid arthritis & detoxifier hence detoxifies liver.
plants.point4: Prevents oedema & pressure effects of malignant growths of pancreas & brain.

plants.name: Vashalacheera
plants.point1: Pulped leaves with boil water can cure pimples & ulcers & sugared juice is useful for catarrhal afflictions.
plants.point2: Leaf juice with butter helps in cooling & soothing to burns & is demulcent thus used for dysentry.
plants.point3: Seeds are used as abortifacient & roots & leaves removes placenta, membranes after birth.
plants.point4: Leaves & stem used as an anti cancer agents.

plants.name: Thazhuthama/ Punarnava
plants.point1: Diuretic in nature & acts as a slight laxative which prevents constipation & purify blood.
plants.point2: Improves health of heart & white punarnava cures eye disorders.
plants.point3: Cures amavata & inflammations.
plants.point4: Rich in potassium nitrate which causes less urination diseases.

plants.name: Chembarathi
plants.point1: Manages blood pressure & rich in antioxidant hence reduces liver damage.
plants.point2: Relieves from menstrual pain.
plants.point3: Presence of protocatechuic acid slow down growth of cancer cells.
plants.point4: With tea it fight off depression & drinking hibiscus tea cause weight loss.

plants.name: Muringha
plants.point1: Seed oil can protect & nourishes hair & protect liver damage caused by anti-tuberculosis drugs.
plants.point2: Anti-inflammatory property prevents edema from developing.
plants.point3: Muringha extract prevent cancer cell development.
plants.point4: Protects against kidney disorders & makes bones healthier.

plants.name: Brahmi
plants.point1: Improves memory, anxiety, hyperactivity disorders & cures Alzheimerâ€™s disease.
plants.point2: Its extracts for 5 months prevent seizures of epilepsy.
plants.point3: Helps to reduce ADHD (Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder) symptoms.
plants.point4: The powdered is added to hot water making a soothing tea to relieve from stress.

plants.name: Arya veppu/ Neem
plants.point1: Used as an insecticide & stem, root, bark can be used in tonic & astringent.
plants.point2: Seed oil are used for leprosy & intestinal worms.
plants.point3: Bark is used for malaria, stomach ulcer, skin disease.
plants.point4: Due to its antibacterial activity, it is an ingredient in toothpaste, mouthwash and oral health tonics.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.point1: Its gel contains powerful antioxidants called polyphenols.
plants.point2: It reduces dental plaques & accelerates the healing of burns.
plants.point3: It reduces constipation & lowers blood sugar levels.
plants.point4: Aloe vera is good for hair growth.

plants.name: Adalodakam
plants.point1: It cures respiratory disorders & treats local bleeding.
plants.point2: It removes the toxins in blood and purifies it.
plants.point3: Used to quick labour and promote easier childbirth.
plants.point4: A good bio-insect killer to kill bacteria.

plants.name: Thulsi
plants.point1: It contains Vitamin C and antioxidants which protects the heart from the harmful effects of free radicals.
plants.point2: It protects the skin from all the damages.
plants.point3: Treats kidney stones & relieves headaches.
plants.point4: Fights acne & relieves fever.

plants.name: Ummam
plants.point1: Leaves are good to relieve headaches.
plants.point2: The vapour of the leaves are used to relieve arthritis.
plants.point3: The ethanol extract of leaves is used as repellent against larva and mosquitoes.
plants.point4: The leaves are used to treat heart problems & leaf juice is applied over the scalp to treat hair fall.

plants.name: Ashokavanam
plants.point1: The bark is used to prepare cosmetics that help to improve skin complexion.
plants.point2: The seeds are used in the treatment of urinary discharges.
plants.point3: The alcoholic extracts of both the flowers have shown antimicrobial activities.
plants.point4: It is used to treat menorrhagia,internal bleeding etc.

plants.name: Alpam
plants.point1: The roots are used in the treatment of diarrhea and dysentery.
plants.point2: Paste prepared from the plant with oil is effective against chronic sores and ulcers.
plants.point3: The juice of this plant is taken internally for cough.
plants.point4: The stems and leaves are reported as diuretic.
